sen.j: 正親町三条実福（おおぎまちさんじょう さねとみ、天文 (元号)5年（1536年） - 永禄11年1月25日 (旧暦)（1568年2月22日））は、室町時代後期の公卿。
sen.e: Sanefuku OGIMACHISANJO (1536 - February 22, 1568) was a Kugyo (a top court official) in the late Muromachi period.
Sanefuku OGIMACHISANJO (1536 - February 22, 1568) was a Kugyo (top court official) during the late Muromachi period.
Sanetomi OGIMACHISANJO (1536 - March 3) was a Kugyo (top court official) during the late Muromachi period.
sen.cmt: グレゴリオ暦にし、読みを変えました。

sen.j: 後奈良天皇（105代）・正親町天皇（106代）の二帝にわたり仕えた廷臣で官位は従二位権中納言まで昇った。
sen.e: He was a retainer of Imperial Court who served two generations: Emperor Gonara (105th) and Emperor Ogimachi (106th), and his highest official court rank was Junii Chunagon (Junior Second Rank, Middle Counselor).

He was a retainer of the Imperial Court who served two generations: Emperor Gonara (105th) and Emperor Ogimachi (106th), and his highest official court rank was Junii Chunagon (Junior 2nd Rank, Middle Counselor).

He was a retainer of the Imperial Court who served two generations: Emperor Gonara (105th) and Emperor Ogimachi (106th), and his highest official court rank was Junii (Junior Second Rank), Gon Chunagon (a provisional vice-councilor of state).
sen.cmt: リンク文字列が含まれていたので、原文・訳文共に修正しました。

sen.j: 父は内大臣正親町三条公兄。
sen.e: His father was Naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Naidaijin (the Minister of the Interior) Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
His father was Naidaijin (Minister of the Interior) Kine OGIMACHISANJO.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせました。

sen.j: 母は加賀介藤原某（富樫氏と言われる）の娘。
sen.e: His mother was the daughter of a certain Fujiwara in Kaga Province (said to be the Togashi clan).
His mother was the daughter of a certain Fujiwara in Kaga Province (said to be from the Togashi clan).
His mother was the daughter of a certain Fujiwara in Kaga no suke (Assistant governor of Kaga Province) (said to be from the Togashi clan).
sen.cmt: リンク文字列が含まれていたので、原文・訳文共に修正しました。

sen.j: 子に権中納言正親町三条公仲がいる。
sen.e: He had a child Chunagon Kiminaka OGIMACHISANJO.
He had a child Chunagon Kiminaka OGIMACHISANJO.
He had a child Gon Chunagon Kiminaka OGIMACHISANJO.
sen.cmt: リンク文字列が含まれていたので、原文・訳文共に修正しました。

sen.e: He was ennobled in 1540.
He was ennobled in 1540.
He was ennobled in 1540.

sen.j: 以降累進して、侍従・越前介・右近衛少将・尾張権介を経て、弘治 (日本)3年（1557年）参議となり、公卿に列する。
sen.e: After that, he was promoted successively to jiju (a chamberlain), Echizen Province, Konoefu (the Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and Owari Province, and finally became Sangi in 1557 to rank with Kugyo.

After that, he was promoted successively to jiju (chamberlain), Echizen Province, Konoefu (Headquarters of the Inner Palace Guards), and Owari Province, and finally became Sangi in 1557 to rank with Kugyo.

After that, he was promoted successively to jiju (chamberlain), Echizen no suke (Assistant Governor of Echizen Province), Ukone no shosho (Minor Captain of the Right Division of Inner Palace Guards), and Owari no Gon no suke (Provisional Assistant Governor of Owari Province), and finally became Sangi in 1557 to rank with Kugyo.
sen.cmt: リンク文字列が含まれていたので、原文・訳文共に修正しました。

sen.j: 永禄元年（1558年）に甲斐国へ下向したが、翌年には帰京。
sen.e: He went down to Kai Province in 1558, but returned to Kyoto in the following year.
He went to Kai Province in 1558, but returned to Kyoto during the following year.
He went to Kai Province in 1558, but returned to Kyoto during the following year.

sen.j: 永禄5年（1562年）に権中納言に任じられる。
sen.e: He was assigned to Chunagon in 1562.
He was assigned to Chunagon in 1562.
He was assigned to Gon Chunagon in 1562.
sen.cmt: リンク文字列が含まれていたので、原文・訳文共に修正しました。

sen.j: 永禄8年（1565年）には駿河国へ下向。
sen.e: He went down to Suruga Province in 1565.
He went to Suruga Province in 1565.
He went to Suruga Province in 1565.

sen.j: その翌年には帰京したが、永禄10年（1567年）には正親町天皇の勅勘を被り、蟄居を命じられた。
sen.e: He returned to Kyoto the next year, but in 1567, he was punished by Imperial order by Emperor Ogimachi and confined to his home.
He returned to Kyoto the following year, but in 1567, he was punished on the Imperial orders of Emperor Ogimachi and confined to his home.
He returned to Kyoto the following year, but in 1567, he was punished on the Imperial orders of Emperor Ogimachi and confined to his home.
He decease the next year.
He died the following year.
He died the following year.
His age at death was 33.
His age at death was thirty-three.
Died at the age of 33.
sen.cmt: 統一リストに合わせました。
